"Why should I envy them? My chance is not lost, ancUnaybe I shall see the Emperor imme- diately!" thojught Rost6v and galloped on. 
When he came level with the Foot Guards he noticed that about them and around them cannon balls were flying, of which he was aware not so much because he heard their sound as because he saw uneasiness on the sol- diers' faces and unnatural warlike solemnity on those of the officers.
